original_text:
He unleashes his lightning beneath the whole heaven
    and sends it to the ends of the earth.
korean_text: 그 소리를 천하에 펼치시며 번갯불을 땅 끝까지 이르게 하시고

sentences.original_text: He unleashes his lightning beneath the whole heaven
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 온 하늘 아래 번개를 쏘아보내며

sentences.original_text: and sends it to the ends of the earth
